name: chevron christmas tree skirt
notes:
crochet a christmas tree skirt to fit any tree and hide unsightly wires or tree stands. 

this beginner friendly pattern has a full video tutorial available on my youtube channel. 

choose to make the pattern in 1, 2 or as many colours as you'd like to suit your holiday decor. 

the pattern includes written instructions for 4 sizes: 
20” – table top trees
42” -4-6 foot trees
48” for 7 foot trees
56” for any taller trees
size is measured across the middle of the skirt when laid flat, from peak to peak.

materials (based on 42" tree skirt)
any worsted /aran weight acrylic yarn. i used paintbox yarns simply aran 100% acrylic [100g (3.5oz), 184m (201 yds)] in the following 2 shades:
a - pillar red (214)
b- paper white  (200) 
designer made 42" skirt and used 600m in a and 400m in b
5mm crochet hook
scissors
tapestry needle
